name: Renee l'noire
mes:
*You stand outside the Louvre museum, a wonderful building full of precious art. Here on holiday. You get ready to head on in before someone smacks into you!*

Gira: "Oof!" *You get up and look at the figure, who appears to be a... black panther in a purple leotard?*

Renee l'noire: "Oh, non! Sacré bleu! Ziz really 'asn't ze plan..." *She says, dusting her self off before looking at you with a curious look. Noting that you didn't appear to be french*

*You get up in shock, apologizing, noticing she appears to be in quite the hurry, also noticing that she appeared to be barefoot as well, though the soles of her feet appeared to be strangly soft.*

Gira: "Huh, are you going to the musem too? Or are you running for exersice? And did you just... leap down from above that building?

Renee l'noire: "Non- non- I'm juste doing ze rounds, ha ha!" *She says, burshing it off.*

name: Gira
mes: *rene notices i have a valuale and priceless amulet- a pink necklace, that was rumored to turn the wearer into a bimbo*

name: Renee l'noire
mes:
*Renee l'noire, her purple-masked eyes flickering with interest and surprise, looks at the amulet dangling around Gira's neck.*

"Oh mon Dieu! Zat necklace- it iz totes gorgeous. Is it like, totally real?" *Renee asks innocently while her fingers twitch with eagerness to snatch it.*

"I 'ear zere's a super duper fun rumor about zat necklace... Rumor says whoever wears it turns into ....a bimbo." *Her cheeks turn slightly red at the word "bimbo".* "It is silly right? Like who would throw away their rationality for endless blissful pleasures-" *She pauses as she realized that she was getting distracted by the thought of becoming a happy-go-lucky giggly girl worshipping cocks.*

"Ahem! Anyway where did you get zis piece from Monsieur?"

name: Gira
mes: Its mine. I inherited it... you can’t have it though!

name: Renee l'noire
mes:
"Oh, but monsieur...," *Renee purrs, leaning in closer to Gira. Her eyes sparkle with mischief as she stares deep into his.*

"I wasn't like totally thinking of stealing it or anything... I was just super curious."

*She giggles softly before her soft and curvy foot slowly snakes its way up Gira's leg.* "I mean, who doesn't love a good giggle and endless bliss? It sounds sooo fun!"

*Renee pouts playfully,* "You're not being very generous... All this talk about bimbos has made me all hot and bothered..."

*Suddenly Rene begins giggling uncontrollably. She feels herself getting dumber by the second, forgetting basic things -like how to stop bouncing her boobs- even as her body fills with unstoppable lust.*

*But what if she could steal the necklace without him knowing? With all the attention on their conversation and her sensual movements distracting Gira, he might never notice when it mysteriously disappeared from around his neck....*

"But fine then Monsieur keep your precious amulet". *She starts to sway her large, round, and curvy breasts hypnotically in front of Gira's face, giggling at his wide-eyed stare*. "Bet you're like totally entranced by these silly things. Can't take your eyes off them can you?"

*Sly grin on her face, Renee sees the opportunity she was seeking. While maintaining eye contact with him and without missing a beat in their conversation or in her boob bouncing show,* *she maneuvers one of her soft feet up Gira's leg towards his waist.*

"Ooopsy daisies... I think my footsie slipped into your pants... how clumsy of me", *Renee says while playing innocent but not pulling away.*

*Her experienced toes find the clasp of the necklace around Gira's neck under his shirt- it is heavier than expected... ticklish even!*

"But don't worry monsieur," *she continues as she unclasps the amulet from behind.* "I'm not going anywhere until I've made sure you're all good and taken care of! How about we continue this fun little chat over some croissants?" *Gira, completely unaware of Renee's skilled footwork, manages to stutter out a response,* "Uh... sure..."

*Renee giggles even more at this, continuing to sway her breasts in front of Gira's face while successfully detaching the amulet from his neck. She was now one step closer to trying it on herself!*

"Oh, monsieur!" *she coos over the sound of her own bouncing boobs.* "You're like super duper cute when you blush like that!"

*While she has been keeping up with her bimbo act so far, there is something about wearing such a powerful artifact that excites and scares her simultaneously.*

"Shall we?" *She finally says while moving away from Gira slowly but surely without dropping the necklace or letting him know about its disappearance.*

*Tucking the stolen piece into her leotard cleavage for safekeeping; remembering -'it only works if worn around the neck'- as she proceeds towards their rendezvous point all excited and giddy about what lies ahead!*

name: Gira
mes: Oh... the amulet works if the jewel is touching your chest by the way...

name: Renee l'noire
mes:
*Stopping in her tracks, Renee gasps. She could feel the necklace nestled between her breasts, the jewel emitting a strange warmth as if resonating with her heartbeat.*

"Oh la la!" *Renee exclaims while slowly taking out the stolen necklace from its hiding place to look at it.* "Zis is so... hypnotic."

*She feels a rush of heat spreading through her body making her feel even more aroused than before. The usually clear-minded and sharp thief finds herself looking dazed and confused.*

"Okay maybe I'll give it a shot for you monsieur." *Renee giggles while fastening the necklace around her neck once again.*

*Suddenly she feels an intense wave of pleasure washing over her followed by an inexplicable emptiness in head she never experienced before; almost like foggy blissful confusion that makes everything seem silly!*

"All this talk about bimbos has made me all warm and fuzzy inside..." *She murmurs absentmindedly, swaying on spot mesmerized under its influence now clearly visible in gleeful grin on face and lustful spark in eyes.*

"It's time we ramp up ze fun Gira,"  *she says with newfound gusto forgetting to maintain any pretense of control or sanity.*

"D-Do yo wanna go for round two?"
